title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the approximation

1 point is earned for the explanation

∫ 0 12 r ′ ( t )  dt≈2( 4.0 )+3( 2.0 )+2( 1.2 )+4( 0.6 )+1( 0.5 ) =19.3 ft MathType@MTEF@5@5@@6245@

∫ 0 12 r ′ ( t )  dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4062@ is the change in the radius, in feet, from

t = 0 to t = 12 minutes.

1 point is earned for units in (b) and (c)

Units of ft 3 /min MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3C40@ in part (b) and ft in part (c)

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the conclusion with reason

Since r is concave down, r' is decreasing on 0 < t < 12.

Therefore, this approximation, 19.3 ft, is less than

∫ 0 12 r ′ ( t ) dt. MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4071@
